softwares.name: Github desktop App
softwares.description: RGitHub Desktop is an open source tool that enables you to be more productive

reviews: easy monitoring of changes to all branches
allows for seamless collaboration without compromising the integrity of the original project
GitHub Desktop allows developers to synchronize branches, clone repositories, and more.
